name: Goblin Merchant (Oswald33)
description:
Team: Lu Wang, Yuqing Xie, Zeduo Ouyang (Oswald), Zhenyi Wei

This project is a system design assignment during my UC Santa Cruz Games & Playable Media M.S. program. We were required to use Microsoft Excel only to create a game with a whole system. 

In  this game, your are a goblin merchant that purchase goods everyday and then sell them to other creatures living in the world. Every customer you have met may have their own stories, try to find them out. And also, living as a merchant gives you the chance to know the secret that is on going, but can lead you to danger as well. Try your best to survive! And to pursue the ending you expect!
